Privacy Policy • Effective September, 2018

If you choose to use Road Rooster, then you agree to the collection and use of information in relation to this policy. The terms used in this Privacy Policy have the same meanings as in our Terms and Conditions, which is accessible at Road Rooster unless otherwise defined in this Privacy Policy.

The Personal Information we collect is used for providing and improving the service. It will not shared with anyone except as described in this Privacy Policy.

Information Collection and Use

Location data As this is a tracking application, it does need to collect location after a certain period of time. But it does so only when you have an active Rooster in place or the application is in the foreground. For better experience some of this data might be cached on the user device and in no way is being collected by the developer.

Advertisement ID The app does use third-party services that may collect information used to identify your online preferences to serve you relevant sponsored contents. You can opt out of target advertisement under your device preferences and is not related to Road Rooster in any way.

Analytics and Application Log In a case of an error in the app, it may send up log traces which is specific to this application, along with necessary system info to help reproduce it. It facilitates in debugging and fixing up issues a lot faster so that you can enjoy a crash free application. Also, the app might send a few basic information regarding the usage pattern to help understand in-app-flow/statistics to increase the quality of service provided. The information collected is anonymous and does not relate back to you.

Security of Personal information We are not storing or exchanging any personal information in this application. We value your trust and thus we are striving to use commercially acceptable means of protecting it. Remember to download this application from a trusted provider. The developer is not responsible for any malware or adware being bundled up in case you have downloaded it from an external source.

Changes to This Privacy Policy We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. Thus, you are advised to review this page periodically for any changes. These changes are effective immediately after they are posted on this page.
